name: Jailbreak (itch) (DevMG)
description:
In Jailbreak, your goal is to reach the exist to escape jail. Make your way though jail by pick locking doors, using riots as a distraction, and hide in airway vents.

Jailbreak is a prototype developed during GAME 445.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys to move.
  • E to interact
  • Q to pick up item(s)
  • Space to jump
Credits
  • Martin Garcia - Assistant Programmer, Game & Level Designer
  • Juan Pablo Vegas - Lead Programmer, UI Designer
  • Brandon Washington - Assistant Programmer, Character & AI Rigger
